Module com.example.miniproject2
Package com.example.miniproject2.model

Interface IGame

All Known Implementing Classes:
AGame, Game
public interface IGame
The IGame interface defines the contract for Sudoku game implementations. It outlines the essential methods that any game class must implement to manage the state and operations of a Sudoku game.

      Parameters:

    • solveActualBoard

      boolean solveActualBoard(ArrayList<ArrayList<Integer>> actualBoard)
      Attempts to solve the current state of the actual board.
      Parameters:
      actualBoard - The current state of the board to solve.
      Returns:
      true if the board was successfully solved, false otherwise.

    • isSolved

      boolean isSolved()
      Checks if the current Sudoku puzzle is solved.
      Returns:
      true if the puzzle is solved, false otherwise.

    • getSolvedBoard

      Retrieves the solved board configuration.
      Returns:
